content: the eloise belt bag is the perfect accessory for summer comprised of 4 granny square seamed together this bag is quick to make and perfect for using up scraps of yarn i ve included plenty of photos throughout the entire process to make this bag as easy as possible to crochet and assemble this bag is lined and has a zipper while these are optional i really recommend taking the time to add these to your bag as it will add durability and practicality to your bag for the straps i recommend purchasing some straps for ease and they re more durable but there s an option for crochet straps in the pattern there is tutorial photos for both of these in the pattern free pattern https //stitchberryblog com/2024/08/05/granny-square-belt-bag-free-crochet-pattern/ ad-free pdf https //stitchberrypatterns etsy com/listing/1768476809
